title: Desserts
content: A collection of classic French desserts. These will make an elegant, not to mention delicious ending to any meal.

items.item_description: A classic French delicacy, filled with rich chocolate ganache.
Delicate apple tart drizzled with caramel sauce and served with whipped cream.
Delicate crêpes in buttery, orange sauce; served flambé.

title: Mains
content: From light sole meunière to a hearty Bouillabaisse, there is something for everyone. Always made with fresh, local-sourced ingredients.

items.item_description: Roasted duck breast with crispy skin and velvety citrus sauce.
Traditional Provençal fish stew, with shrimp, mussels, clams and monkfish.
chicken cooked in Riesling with onions, mushrooms and herbs.
Sole, pan fried in butter and served with brown butter sauce, parsley and lemon.

title: Hors d'œuvre
content: A French phrase meaning out of the work, used to mean food served as an appetizer before a meal.

items.item_description: with quick pickle of dried apricots
Smoked Salmon topped with Creme Fraiche, fresh Dill and Capers.
Traditional Alsatian dish made with home-smoked bacon and onions.
